featured.text: Every time we watch apes in their cages we are startled by their manlike behavior.
I don’t agree with caging animals for our entertainment.

However, each time he lost a dove into the cold water, and—with the help of her competition, his coaches would lock him in a cage sister and two men—swam and pushed the boat for for days, feeding him only coffee and bread.
When photographing zoo animals, don’t get too close to the cages, and never tap on the glass or throw things between the bars of a cage.

definition.zh_def: 籠子；用來關住動物或物品的結構。
definition.en_def: A structure made of wire or bars in which animals or objects are confined.
definition.example: The bird was happily singing inside its cage.
